title: Katie Maloney & All Things #PumpRules
description:
Randall’s filming in Alabama so Katie Maloney steps up to co-host the pod with Lala, and you know what that means… they’re talking all things Vanderpump Rules, including their recent appearance on “Watch What Happens Live with Andy Cohen”! They dish on the cast’s trip to Palm Springs, James & Raquel’s touching convo, and why they call this week’s episode “the calm before the storm.” They also discuss the “reality” of reality TV, why it’s so addicting, and how they handle the loss of anonymity. Plus, Lala answers fan questions submitted on Instagram and tik tok including her glam looks, beauty secrets, thoughts on her current #PumpRules cast members, and her biggest regret from season 4 of the show.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: Lala Kent | Cumulus Podcast Network
